answers.answer: 36+6 and was at 20lbs. and holding for 6 weeks then spiked 7lbs last week....note: I also had ankles until last week. Seem to be retaining lots of water but BP is low so Dr. is not concerned

I'm 35 weeks and have gained 30lbs

There are guidelines for weight gain. Those of us who are obese should gain 10-15. Overweight 15-20. Normal 20-30. Underweight 20-40.Baby/Placenta/Amniotic Fluid etc. are between 20-25 lbs. To gain 20-25 is great and will probably come off in first 6 weeks especially if breast feeding.They say if you gain more than 30, you will struggle to take the excess off.Eat whole natural foods....meat, fish, vegies, fruit, grains. Keep clear of processed fast food and sugar! No sugary drinks, fruit juices, ice cream, cake, cookies etc. Processed junk food causes sugar/insulin spikes which your body and the baby can use so they it gets stored as fat
I gained about 20... but I lost one this week... no clue how since baby boy gained 1.5 lbs in the last 2 weeks.

I went about 7 weeks without gaining anything in second trimester. Baby went from 54% tile for growth to 78% tile. He gained close to 3 lbs. and is now considered larger than average.Good News! You baby will use your fat stores for energy to grow! Your baby can grow a bit without you losing weight. Losing a lb can also just be water/digestion related.

35 weeks 38 lbs. With my first I gained 70 total. Lost 80 within four months and was smaller than ever before!Don't let anyone freak you out about it. Everyone loses weight differently and strict guidelines on weight gain don't apply to everyone. If you really want to lose the weight, you will!
35 weeks. Gained 15 lbs. I am considered normal weight.

36+3 I have gained about 10kg which is about 20lbs im pretty sure lol and lost weight this week which im hoping is ok, went to a dif doc today and he tells me bub is measuring about a week behind now when she was always a week ahead. .

I was at 54 last Thursday. I gained 8lbs in two weeks and got completely freaked out. I haven't been eating like crazy to gain that much! BP was ok so doctor didn't get worried, but I did. Baby well be somewhat big I think. At least 8lbs....I'm so concerned about losing all this weight!! Never in my life!
37w4d and have gained 31 pounds. I gained 8 two weeks ago and gained one pound this week. I don't know whats up since I've been eating completely normal but my doctors isint too worried.
I am 34w + 5 days and have gained 2kg which is 4lbs.

Im normal weight for my size and have only gained 10ld im 37weeks but I also didnt gain much weight with my first child. I just make tiny babys lol but its concerning cuz I'm underweight for this pregnancy.
I dont know.. thats all I have gained but doctors/midwifes said some people only gain little to none... so there not worried... @Annaslife

-5 pounds. This is my third pregnancy. I started out at a healthy weight but I've been dealing with kidney problems, surgeries, and medication throughout. I look super thin but like I'm trying to hide a watermelon under my shirt.
